thread.title: Propertymarket.Mt Welcomes 10 New Partner Agents, Cementing Its Position As Malta's Largest Real Estate Platform
thread.title_full: Propertymarket.Mt Welcomes 10 New Partner Agents, Cementing Its Position As Malta's Largest Real Estate Platform

author: marketing@menafn.com (MENAFN)
title: Propertymarket.Mt Welcomes 10 New Partner Agents, Cementing Its Position As Malta's Largest Real Estate Platform
text:
Propertymarket.Mt Welcomes 10 New Partner Agents, Cementing Its Position As Malta's Largest Real Estate Platform
MENAFN- GetNews)
A Larger Network Powering Smarter Property Decisions
With more partner agents now publishing listings and serving clients through com, users gain broader choice and faster discovery across Malta and Gozo. The platform already showcases deep market breadth, including:
-
10,000+ apartments for sale in Malta & Gozo from 25+ estate agents, alongside 2,135 penthouses for sale, and niche categories such as Houses of Character.
Real-time browsing across 37,128 properties for sale and 19,610 properties to rent, with flexible filters for location, price bands, property types (apartments, penthouses, maisonettes, houses & villas, bungalows, character properties, commercial, land, garages), and bedroom counts.
This expanded agent roster helps accelerate response times, broadens local expertise, and increases the likelihood that users will find the right match, whether they're searching for a seafront apartment in Sliema, a family home in Mosta, or an investment option in Gozo.
End-to-End Guidance: Buying, Selling, and Renting
Beyond listings, com distinguishes itself with step-by-step guides tailored to Malta's real estate journey:
-
Selling: Practical advice to sell fast and hassle-free while aiming for the best possible price.
Buying: Simple steps for finding a dream property, plus a clear view of costs associated with buying in Malta.
Renting: What to look for in a rental property and key considerations before signing a letting agreement.
The platform also offers“Find me a place” assistance, users share what they're looking for and com, together with partnering agents, does the heavy lifting to locate suitable options.
Powerful Search, Clear Pricing Bands, and Location Intelligence
-
Price ranges (e.g., for rent from €100 to €10,000+; for sale from €10,000 to €2,000,000+)
Property types (residential and commercial)
Bedrooms (from studios upward)
Users can toggle by Most Recent, Lowest Price, Highest Price, or Date Added (e.g., last 3/7/30/90 days) to surface listings that match their timing and budget.
To help orient decisions by area, the site highlights Popular Locations such as Sliema, Birkirkara, Mosta, Naxxar, St Julian's, St Paul's Bay, Gzira, Birzebbuga, Marsaskala, and Attard, plus a View All Locations directory for broader browsing.
Data-Driven Context: Price Trends and Market Snapshot
The platform's market overview notes that Malta's residential property price growth continued into Q2 2023, with the nationwide property price index up 8.3% (2.01% inflation-adjusted) year-on-year, following prior YoY increases of 10.51% in Q1 2023, 2.71% in Q4 2022, 5.16% in Q3 2022, 1.71% in Q2 2022, and 1.66% in Q1 2022, as reported by the Central Bank of Malta. The site observes that, despite occasional slowdowns in demand, this represented the second-strongest growth since Q1 2019.
Updated Malta Property Price Index
The Malta Property Price Index provides a clear snapshot of current asking prices based on live listings across com.
These figures serve as guidelines only and are automatically calculated from available data, excluding listings marked“Price on Request,” daily or yearly rates.
Key Highlights:
-
Over 37,000 properties for sale and 19,000 for rent across Malta and Gozo.
Detailed averages across categories such as Apartments, Penthouses, Maisonettes, Houses & Villas, Bungalows, Character Properties, Commercial Properties, Land, and Garages.
Pricing trends available for every major town and village, including Sliema, St Julian's, Birkirkara, Mosta, Naxxar, Mellieha, Gozo regions, and more.
Users can browse the Property Price Index by location to see how average asking prices compare across areas, from urban centers like Gzira and Swieqi to seaside communities like Marsaskala and St Paul's Bay.
The data-driven interface enables property owners, buyers, and investors to make informed choices based on up-to-date pricing visibility.
Thinking of selling? com also offers a free, no-obligation property valuation service, helping homeowners understand their property's current worth before listing.
Disclaimer: Some properties may appear with more than one estate agent.
Why the 10-Agent Expansion Matters
By adding 10 new agents, com deepens listing diversity, accelerates matching, and expands local insight across Malta's most searched categories, from apartments and penthouses to houses of character, villas, townhouses, and commercial properties. The result is a better-connected marketplace where users can compare more options, reach decision clarity faster, and move confidently, whether buying, selling, or renting.
